PerfectNetExp.abs: 职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... thereabouts 在那附近，大约 thereafter 此后，其后，以后 thermal 热的，保温的.
英语单词带音标带词性带例子_百度知道 ... cargo 货物,船货 thereafter 此后 suffer 遭受.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... then 然后 thereafter ad. 此后，据此 therefore ad. 因此，所以.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... beard n. 胡须 thereafter ad. 其后，从那以后 revert vi. 回复，回返.

list.abs: but the first two goals stated by the Meade Committee stand in tension with resource equality , which endorses equal starting points and not the equalization of wealth thereafter .但是米德委员会所声称的前两个目标处于与资源平等的紧张关系中，后者认同平等的起点，但并不认同此后财富的均等化。
thereafter the Treaty shall enter into force for any acceding State upon the deposit ofinstrument of accession .此后本条约应对任何加入国在它交存其加入书时生效。
What happens to the molecule thereafter is of no concern ., 分子继之发生的情况就不用考虑了.
The state of a woman during childbirth or immediately thereafter ., 妇女在分娩期或紧接其后的时期内的状况.

entry.def: Thereafter means after the event or date mentioned.

example.ex: Inflation will fall and thereafter so will interest rates...
example.tran: 通货膨胀率将下跌，随后利率也将下降。

example.ex: It was the only time she had ever discouraged him from dangerous activities and she regretted it thereafter.
example.tran: 那是她唯一一次劝他不要参加危险活动，说完以后她就后悔了。

auth_sentence.content: Thereafter coins are awarded for verifying the account book.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thereafter coins are awarded for verifying the account book.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thereafter coins are awarded for verifying the account book.

auth_sentence.content: Interviews will be held as soon as possible thereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Interviews will be held as soon as possible thereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Interviews will be held as soon as possible thereafter.

auth_sentence.content: Exhausted, his captaincy did not last long thereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Exhausted, his captaincy did not last long thereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Exhausted, his captaincy did not last long thereafter.

means.word_mean: 此后; 在那之后;之后;以后

sentences.cn: 此后他们就不再讲话了。

sentences.en: On the opening day all tickets are a dollar; thereafter, they'll be two dollars.
sentences.cn: 开张那天票价一元, 以后两元。

jushi.english: On the opening day all tickets are a dollar;thereafter,they'll be two dollars.
jushi.chinese: 开张那天票价一元，以后两元。
